SCENEMESSAGE.Settings.BlueChecksHint: Use blue instead of green for hit checks vs AC (may be more red-green colorblind friendly).
SCENEMESSAGE.Settings.HideItemImgHint: Hides the item image and subtitle on item chat cards for a smaller card.
SCENEMESSAGE.Settings.HidePortraitHint: Remove the portraits from chat cards.
SCENEMESSAGE.Settings.HideSubtitleHint: Hide the subtitle which shows the associated username
